name: VEGA - Interactive Education App
description:
This is a project as part of a university project. It is to test a few ideas out, but is ultimately as an idea for an interactive feature. This app will take users through an interactive experience, where they have to follow a story and learn some facts about space and technology we have as a result of research and technology. This was just a concept, and therefore there may be some bugs or issues that will need ironing out, however this is only my second real project using Unity.

Visuals were by Weronika Koscien

Coding and building was by Bradley Edwards (myself)
